content:
also in Judaism and Islam. I take it that the most impor-
tant thing which distinguishes Christiantheism from these other forms of
theism is the acceptance of the Christian scriptures as the revealed word of
God.*And that’s what I shall be arguing against tonight. If the Christian
scriptures are supposed to be God’s revelation of himself to man, then he is
not the perfect being Christians claim he is.
When I was a child, I accepted the Christian religion in which my parents
raised me. But when
